name: Solana Memecoin Bot Dev (Rust + Anchor)
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential pkg-config libssl-dev libclang-dev && . ~/.bashrc && sh -c "$(curl -sSfL https://release.solana.com/v1.18.22/install)" && export PATH="$HOME/.local/share/solana/install/active_release/bin:$PATH" && cargo install --git https://github.com/coral-xyz/anchor avm --locked --force && avm install latest && avm use latest && echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/share/solana/install/active_release/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'source ~/.cargo/env' >> ~/.bashrc
